machines.name: QUICK TURN 250MY
machines.tagline: The industry-standard turning center with milling capability
machines.description: The QUICK TURN 250MY is one of the most popular turning centers in the industry, offering Y-axis milling capability for off-center drilling, milling, and tapping — reducing secondary operations and setup time.

machines.name: QT-PRIMOS
machines.tagline: Compact turning for small parts and tight spaces
machines.description: The QT-PRIMOS is a compact, affordable CNC lathe designed for small-part turning. Its minimal footprint makes it ideal for shops with limited floor space, training environments, or as a dedicated cell for small-diameter production.

machines.name: HQR NEO
machines.tagline: Twin-spindle, multi-turret production turning
machines.description: The HQR NEO features dual opposing spindles and up to three turrets for simultaneous machining of both ends of a workpiece. Designed for high-volume production, it dramatically reduces cycle times by performing multiple operations simultaneously.
features: Up to 3 turrets for simultaneous cutting

machines.name: SYNCREX 25/8
machines.tagline: Mid-range Swiss-type for precision small parts
machines.description: The SYNCREX 25/8 is an 8-axis Swiss-type production turning machine built for high-speed production of small, precise parts up to 25mm (1") diameter. Its HDCC base construction delivers 10% more rigidity than cast iron with 80% less vibration, resulting in superior surface finishes and 30% longer tool life.

machines.name: SYNCREX 32/9
machines.tagline: Full-featured Swiss-type for larger bar work
machines.description: The SYNCREX 32/9 delivers maximum flexibility with its 9-axis configuration and 32mm (1.25") bar capacity. Designed for complex parts requiring simultaneous front and back machining, it's ideal for medical, aerospace, and automotive components that demand tight tolerances and high throughput.
features: Full front and back simultaneous machining

machines.name: SYNCREX 38/9X
machines.tagline: 5-axis Swiss-type for the most complex small parts
machines.description: The SYNCREX 38/9X is the most capable model in the SYNCREX lineup, combining 5-axis machining with the largest bar capacity at 38mm (1.5"). Its advanced axis configuration enables complex geometries and off-angle features in a single setup, eliminating secondary operations for the most demanding Swiss-type applications.

machines.name: MEGA TURN 500M
machines.tagline: Compact vertical turning with integrated milling
machines.description: The MEGA TURN 500M combines vertical turning with milling capability in a compact footprint. Its traveling column design provides a large machining area while the 12-position drum turret and optional automatic tool changer enable complex part processing in a single setup.

machines.name: MEGA TURN 900
machines.tagline: Heavy-duty vertical turning for large workpieces
machines.description: The MEGA TURN 900 is a heavy-duty vertical turning center built for large-diameter, heavy parts up to 6,614 lbs. Its vertical spindle orientation uses gravity to support the workpiece, and an optional 2-pallet changer enables reduced setup time and long continuous machining.

machines.name: MEGA TURN 1600
machines.tagline: Maximum capacity vertical turning for the largest parts
machines.description: The MEGA TURN 1600 is the largest in the lineup, handling workpieces up to 1,650mm (65") in diameter. Its massive machining envelope with integrated milling capability makes it the go-to solution for aerospace, energy, and heavy industry components that other machines simply can't accommodate.
features: Largest machining envelope in the series

machines.name: VCN-460
machines.tagline: Reliable vertical machining for everyday production
machines.description: The VCN-460 is a versatile vertical machining center built for reliable, accurate production. Its rigid column and table design provide excellent cutting performance for a wide range of materials and applications.

machines.name: VC-Ez IP
machines.tagline: Easy-to-operate vertical with integrated automation
machines.description: The VC-Ez IP combines easy operation with built-in automation capability. Its intuitive SmoothEz control makes it accessible for operators of all skill levels, while its automation-ready design supports unattended production.

machines.name: FJV
machines.tagline: Double-column rigidity for high-accuracy large-part machining
machines.description: The FJV features a double-column bridge design for exceptional rigidity and accuracy when machining large workpieces. Its symmetric structure minimizes thermal distortion, making it ideal for mold, die, and aerospace applications requiring tight tolerances.

machines.name: HCN-5000S
machines.tagline: High-production horizontal with pallet changer
machines.description: The HCN-5000S is a high-production horizontal machining center with a 2-pallet changer for continuous operation. Its horizontal spindle orientation excels at chip evacuation, making it ideal for deep-pocket and cavity machining in high-volume environments.

machines.name: HCN-4000 NEO
machines.tagline: Eco-friendly horizontal for medium-volume production
machines.description: The HCN-4000 NEO combines proven horizontal machining center performance with energy-saving technology. Its eco-friendly design reduces power consumption while maintaining the productivity and accuracy expected from a Mazak horizontal.

machines.name: FF-1250H
machines.tagline: Large-capacity horizontal for heavy-duty machining
machines.description: The FF-1250H is a large-capacity horizontal machining center designed for heavy workpieces and aggressive cutting. Its HSK-A100 spindle delivers high rigidity and torque for demanding materials like titanium, Inconel, and hardened steel.

machines.name: VARIAXIS i NEO
machines.tagline: Versatile 5-axis machining for complex geometries
machines.description: The VARIAXIS i NEO delivers full simultaneous 5-axis machining with a fully supported trunnion table for superior rigidity. Its wide range of spindle and table options allows configuration for everything from aluminum aerospace parts to hardened steel mold work.

machines.name: VARIAXIS C
machines.tagline: Compact 5-axis performance for smaller shops
machines.description: The VARIAXIS C brings full 5-axis capability to shops with limited floor space. Its compact design doesn't compromise on rigidity or accuracy, making it an ideal choice for medical, dental, and precision component manufacturers.

machines.name: VARIAXIS i-300 AWC
machines.tagline: Automated 5-axis with built-in workpiece changer
machines.description: The VARIAXIS i-300 AWC features an integrated Auto Work Changer for unattended, lights-out production. Load up to 32 pallets and let the machine run — ideal for high-mix, low-volume production of complex 5-axis parts.

machines.name: VORTEX i-V
machines.tagline: Tilt-spindle 5-axis for large vertical work
machines.description: The VORTEX i-V uses a tilt-spindle design rather than a tilting table, enabling 5-axis machining of large, heavy workpieces. Its vertical configuration is perfect for aerospace structural components, large molds, and energy sector parts.

machines.name: INTEGREX i NEO
machines.tagline: The benchmark in multi-tasking performance
machines.description: The INTEGREX i NEO series combines full 5-axis milling and turning capabilities in a single setup, reducing cycle times and improving accuracy. Equipped with Mazak's latest SmoothAi CNC, it delivers intelligent machining with thermal compensation and vibration suppression.

machines.name: INTEGREX i-500
machines.tagline: Large-capacity multi-tasking for demanding applications
machines.description: The INTEGREX i-500 is designed for large, complex workpieces that require full turning, milling, and 5-axis contouring in a single setup. Its robust construction and large machining envelope make it ideal for aerospace, energy, and heavy industry components.

machines.name: INTEGREX j-200 NEO
machines.tagline: Eco-friendly multi-tasking for the modern shop
machines.description: The INTEGREX j-200 NEO delivers done-in-one machining in a compact, energy-efficient package. Its smaller footprint and lower power consumption make it an excellent entry point into multi-tasking, without sacrificing capability or precision.

machines.name: OPTIPLEX NEO
machines.tagline: Versatile fiber laser for thin and thick material
machines.description: The OPTIPLEX NEO is Mazak's most versatile 2D fiber laser, available in power options from 4 kW to 20 kW. It excels at high-speed cutting of thin sheet and high-quality cutting of thick plate, making it the go-to machine for shops that process a wide range of material types and thicknesses.

machines.name: OPTIPLEX HP
machines.tagline: Maximum power for the thickest material
machines.description: The OPTIPLEX HP delivers up to 30 kW of fiber laser power for high-quality cutting of the thickest plate material. When your production demands maximum cutting speed and the ability to process thick mild steel, stainless, and aluminum, the HP is the answer.

machines.name: OPTIPLEX Ez
machines.tagline: Cost-effective fiber laser for everyday cutting
machines.description: The OPTIPLEX Ez delivers reliable fiber laser cutting performance at an accessible price point. Available in 4 kW and 6 kW configurations, it's an ideal entry point for shops transitioning from CO2 to fiber laser technology or adding laser cutting capacity.

machines.name: FG-400 NEO
machines.tagline: 3D laser for large pipes and structural material
machines.description: The FG-400 NEO is a 3D fiber laser designed for cutting long pipes and structural material up to 406mm (16") round and 305mm (12") square. With workpiece lengths up to 15m, it handles the large structural components used in construction, infrastructure, and heavy fabrication.

machines.name: FT-150 NEO
machines.tagline: High-speed tube and pipe laser cutting
machines.description: The FT-150 NEO is a high-speed tube and pipe fiber laser optimized for fast processing of smaller diameter material up to 152mm (6") round. Its high-speed cutting capability and compact design make it ideal for high-volume tube fabrication in furniture, automotive, and architectural applications.

machines.name: FT-250
machines.tagline: High-power tube laser for larger diameter material
machines.description: The FT-250 steps up to 6 kW laser power and larger tube capacity up to 254mm (10") round, handling a wider range of tube and structural profiles at production speeds. Multiple length options accommodate both standard and oversized material.
